summary.Title: LOOKING FOR A CARPENTER JOB?
summary.Presentation: Are you a skilled carpenter looking for new challenges, then we might need you. We are currently looking for a team of 2 independent and skilled carpenters with great experience. You

WorkPlace.Name: JT WORKS ApS
WorkPlace.Description: JTWORKS.dk er 100% Dansk ejet og en seriøs samarbejdspartner. Vi har en bred erhvervserfarring på arbejdsmarkedet. Vi rekrutterer og udlejer såvel faglært som ufaglært arbejdskraft. Vi leverer professionelle bemandingsløsninger, inden for en lang række fagområder. Uanset om der er tale om ekstra kapicitet i en periode eller en mere permanent løsning, tilbyder vi vikar assistance til virksomheder og private.

HiringOrg.Description: JTWORKS.dk er 100% Dansk ejet og en seriøs samarbejdspartner. Vi har en bred erhvervserfarring på arbejdsmarkedet. Vi rekrutterer og udlejer såvel faglært som ufaglært arbejdskraft. Vi leverer professionelle bemandingsløsninger, inden for en lang række fagområder. Uanset om der er tale om ekstra kapicitet i en periode eller en mere permanent løsning, tilbyder vi vikar assistance til virksomheder og private.

JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Are you a skilled carpenter looking for new challenges, then we might need you.
We are currently looking for a team of 2 independent and skilled carpenters with great experience. You will be a part of a very professional and well-established company with great colleagues and good opportunities. Your first project will be a summerhouse building in Them working with all-around carpentry tasks. Start date: ASAP.

We offer:

  • Payment according to qualifications
  • Pension, holiday-money and SH
  • 46 working hours per week
  • We provide working clothes and tools
  • Long-term employment

We expect that you are skilled carpenter with good experience. Furthermore, we expect:

  • That you are committed and quality-oriented
  • That you are a team player, but also independent
  • That you are fluent in English

Are you interested in this kind of project, please don’t hesitate to contact our consultants: fek@jtworks.dk / 53774802
iw@jtworks.dk / 24210379
